name: Snowhere to Run
description:
Try it on desktop for better visuals and performance.

Arrow Keys / AD to move, space / enter to jump and accept.  Press escape for pause menu with options and credits.

An endless runner game where you gather snow to keep yourself intact.  Your job is to deliver a message to command, and not get killed in the crossfire on your way.  Get the message as far as you are able.   Watch out for obstacles, and raining snow bombs.  Be sure to grab what snow you can to keep yourself going, and keep your eyes open for special power ups.

Credits:

Oeslian / Ben Ventura - Programming, Art

Sean Menzies - Programming

aokay - Music

David Kay - Banner Art
